event_name: White and Gold Latin Night – October 18th!
location: Ukrainian Cultural Centre, 3277 Douglas St., Victoria, BC
description: Get ready for a night of elegance, rhythm, and celebration at our White and Gold Latin Night! Let’s dance the night away with Salsa, Bachata, and Merengue under the sparkling white and gold ambiance! Dress Code: White & Gold only! Wear your most glamorous attire and let’s make this a night to remember! Dance to the best Latin beats all night long! No partner? No problem! Join our intro class at 8:00 PM! What to Expect: A sophisticated and glittering Latin dance night Elegant white and gold décor A fun and welcoming dance community Let’s shine on the dance floor with elegance and celebrate Latin rhythms in style!
